title: You Can Now View Your Instagram Feed in Chronological Order
sub_head: A new setting lets you view your Instagram feed in the order photos were actually posted, but Meta will still push you back to its algorithms when it can.
body:
We the people: Give us social-media feeds that don’t use algorithms to manipulate what we see.
Instagram: Here’s an upside-down caret the size of an ice-cream sprinkle that you can tap for a temporary solution.
